column6:
"UP IS DOWN AND BLACK IS WHITE",2005,8
Frank Castle's having a rough day: After taking two blasts to the chest from a sawed-off 12-gauge - courtesy of Nick Cavella's lethal and not-so-lovely goon Teresa - he falls into the clutches of Agent O'Brien, a renegade spook who carries a major torch for the Punisher. Is love in the air? Part 6 (of 6).
32 PGS./MAX- EXPLICIT CONTENT ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tim Bradstreet | colorist:Dan Brown | writer:Garth Ennis | penciller:Leandro Fernandez | letterer:Randy Gentile | inker:Scott Hanna
